name: MrBeast's Chocolate Factory
description:
-VIDEO- -Description-

MrBeast is making a chocolate factory for one of his videos, and I want to recreate it as a playable video game!

Compete against 9 other AI contestants in 9 minigames to win the grand prize of- oop, can't tell you that!  

"If You Want To View Paradise, Simply Look Around And View It."

-Willy Wonka
